import { arrProducts } from "../../Service/products" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import './product.css' const links = [ {bg : 'bg-shareBtn-bg', title : 'Share'}, {bg : 'bg-compareBtn-bg', title : 'Compare'}, {bg : 'bg-likeBtn-bg', title : 'Like'}, ] const styleLinks = 'block bg-no-repeat text-white text-base font-semibold pl-[18px]' export default function ProductsItems() { return
{arrProducts.map((item) => { return

{item.name}

{item.cardDescription}

Rp.{item.price} Rp.{item.oldPrice}
{links.map(({bg, title},index) => { return {title} })}
})}
{[1,2,3,4].map((item, index, arr) => { arr.length === index + 1 ? 'Next' : item } )}
}
